-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, May 26, 2007 1:30 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4287848W] [URGENT] Unauthorized Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Material -- Immediate Action Demanded ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. [URGENT] Unauthorized Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Material -- Immediate Action Demanded Added by system at Saturday, May 26 2007 06:25 pm X-MailFrom: IRamage@OMM.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; SEV=2.2.2; DFV=B2007052609; IFV=2.0.4,4.0-9; AIF=B2007052609; RPD=5.02.0125; ENG=IBF; RPDID=7374723D303030312E30413031303230372E34363538433136422E303031352C73 733D312C6667733D30; CAT=NONE; CON=NONE X-MMS-Spam-Filter-ID: B2007052609_5.02.0125_4.0-9 X-WSS-ID: 6A461EED2F02341366-01-01 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C79FEC.D7C4F0A7" Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of OMM.com designates 207.105.246.42 as permitted sender) client-ip=207.105.246.42; envelope-from=IRamage@OMM.com; helo=mail2.omm.com; (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) VIA E-MAIL NOT FOR POSTING To Whom It May Concern: We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple"). It has come to our attention that your website, at http://www.free-codecs.com/download/QuickTime_Alternative.htm/ , is currently distributing a software program called "QuickTime Alternative" (hereinafter, the "Software") in violation of Apple's intellectual property rights. The Software uses codecs (encoders/decoders) and other components from Apple's proprietary QuickTime 7 software. Those codecs and components are copyrighted by Apple, and any unauthorized use or distribution thereof is strictly prohibited. We therefore demand that you: (i) immediately cease distributing or offering for download the Software and all versions of it; (ii) destroy all copies of all versions of the Software in your possession; (iii) refrain from violating Apple's intellectual property in the future. Please reply to this e-mail when you have complied with the first two demands. Thank you in advance for your cooperation, /s/ Ian Ramage Ian Ramage O'Melveny & Myers LLP Embarcadero Center West 275 Battery Street, Suite 2600 San Francisco, CA 94111 Phone: 415.984.8783 Fax: 415.984.8701 iramage@omm.com DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I have a good faith belief that your activities are not authorized by Apple, that the information in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this regard. This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm of O'Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. MIME element (text/html) [URGENT] Illegal Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Material -- Immediate Action Demanded
VIA E-MAIL

NOT FOR POSTING

To Whom It May Concern:

We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple").  It has come to our attention that your website, at http://www.free-codecs.com/download/QuickTime_Alternative.htm/, is currently distributing a software program called "QuickTime Alternative" (hereinafter, the "Software") in violation of Apple's intellectual property rights. 

The Software uses codecs (encoders/decoders) and other components from Apple's proprietary QuickTime 7 software.  Those codecs and components are copyrighted by Apple, and any unauthorized use or distribution thereof is strictly prohibited. 

We therefore demand that you: (i) immediately cease distributing or offering for download the Software and all versions of it; (ii) destroy all copies of all versions of the Software in your possession; (iii) refrain from violating Apple's intellectual property in the future.  Please reply to this e-mail when you have complied with the first two demands. 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation,

/s/ Ian Ramage

Ian Ramage
O’Melveny & Myers LLP
Embarcadero Center West
275 Battery Street, Suite 2600
San Francisco, CA 94111
Phone: 415.984.8783
Fax: 415.984.8701
iramage@omm.com

DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I have a good faith belief that your activities are not authorized by Apple, that the information in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this regard.

This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm of O’Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message.
